# getWidgetBatch

Gets the specified widgets.

| request | type | description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| ids | int32[] | The IDs of the widgets to return. |

| response | type | description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| results | result<[Widget](Widget.md)>[] | The widget results. |
